CustomField.formula:
IF (TEXT( Account__r.Risk_Level__c ) = "High",
IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red Flag"),
IF (TEXT(Account__r.Risk_Level__c ) = "Medium",
IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif","Yellow Flag"),
IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif","Green Flag")))
CustomField.label: Patient Risk Flag
